issue.title: [CF 302] Streamline importing
issue.body:
Marenwynn said
Monday, October 03, 2011 10:21:19 PM (2 days ago)

Thank you so much! This is most excellent. :D

Would it be possible to put import fields under the interface options for TMW, though? It is not really a problem the way the import works now, but it seems awkward to import profiles or groups through the icon configuration screen. I think it would seem more intuitive to import entire profiles under "Profiles" or "Main Options," and groups through "+ Add Another Group +." But whatever works. =P

Anyway, thanks again for this and for all the work you've done on TMW. :) I can't raid without it! Also, if you need a video demonstration to show some of the endless possibilities of the addon to people, I uploaded a video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xwhljoUbMro of my profile in raid, with a link to the import string. ^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #302 | Raw
